summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to relocation services for displaced tenants, authorizing the Director of the Department of Community Development to execute a contract to provide relocation assistance to low income residents displaced by construction of the Washington State Convention and Trade Center (WSCTC); making a partially reimbursable appropriation from the Emergency Fund to the Department of Community Development Operating Fund; increasing the 1988 budget of the Department of Community Development; and declaring the emergency therefor.
